metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21847 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple exploitable integer overflow vulnerabilities exist within theMPEG-4 decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Contentlibrary v1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input in “stts” decoder cancause an integer overflow due to unchecked arithmetic resulting in aheap-based buffer overflow that causes memory corruption. An attacker canconvince a user to open a video to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
